New NG Book Cc This is to inform you that the as of today the Gas group will be officializing a new book NGPROPTPRC This book will capture the Options portion of the NGPRICEPRC Over the weekend the Option deals were tranfered to the new book and test Calc without problems For anyone manually pulling in data related to the NGPRICEPRC or NGPRICEPRC you should adjust your procedures to insure that need data is captured from ERMS system using the new book and no duplicate data is captured On the ERMS system the book id is NGPROPT Errol To insure that credit does not capture old data related to the RisktRAC bookID NGPRICEPRC can you please calc that book to zero for one last time You should use the same procedures previously used to isolate the Options piece from the book To insure that we do not cause problems for the Cash Flow group please calc the options piece first and then the swaps This will insure that the Swaps data is properly capture for the IRFX group If you have any questions please call me at ext Regards Nancy

Completed Bookrequest Cc find completed bookrequest For Information purposes the following is a detail of the various portfolios which contain the newly created book Root Portfolio Portfolio Name AGGECT NGPRCCRUDEP AGGENE NGPRCCRUDEP GASUSER NGPRCCRUDEP COMMODITYVAR NGPRCCRUDEP NGHOUSTON NGPRCCRUDEP USVAR NGPRCCRUDEP COMMODITYVAR NGPRCCRUDEP AGGCREDIT NGPRCCRUDEP DISCOUNTINGUSD NGPRCCRUDEP INFINITYUSD NGPRCCRUDEP POSGASTRD NGPRCCRUDEP CREDITAGG NGPRCCRUDEP AGGGASII NGPRCCRUDEP COMPINCVAR NGPRCCRUDEP AGGGASIV NGPRCCRUDEP Regards Nancy

New NG Book Cc This is to inform you that the as of today the Gas group will be officializing a new book NGPROPTPRC This book will capture the Options portion of the NGPRICEPRC Over the weekend the Option deals were tranfered to the new book and test Calc without problems For anyone manually pulling in data related to the NGPRICEPRC or NGPRICEPRC you should adjust your procedures to insure that need data is captured from ERMS system using the new book and no duplicate data is captured On the ERMS system the book id is NGPROPT Errol To insure that credit does not capture old data related to the RisktRAC bookID NGPRICEPRC can you please calc that book to zero for one last time You should use the same procedures previously used to isolate the Options piece from the book To insure that we do not cause problems for the Cash Flow group please calc the options piece first and then the swaps This will insure that the Swaps data is properly capture for the IRFX group If you have any questions please call me at ext Regards Nancy

Daily log as of Attached please find the daily log as of Please note that going forward there will be a change in the format and timing of log issuance Going forward the action plan and status will no longer be displayed and the log will only be issued once a week as part of the weekly summary distribution The daily exceptions will still be maintained but not distributed If anyone wants information for a specific date please feel free to contact me and I will forward the log as requested If you have any comments or concerns please feel free to call me at ext Thank you for time an attention Regards Nancy

RE POWERSSRCPRC book Cc You can inactive the book on the activeinactive website Do you also need the books counterparty ID inactivated If yes please reply and provide the CPID that needs to be suspended Please also ensue that the book has been uploaded with zeros values to ensure compliance with Credit and cash flow requirments Regards Nancy Original Message From Mattox Michael Sent Friday October PM To Hernandez Nancy Cc White Stacey W Evans Casey Subject POWERSSRCPRC book Nancy The following book POWERSSRCPRC should be made inactive The book was for a compound option that was being calculated on a spreadsheet The option was not exercised and its value was taken to yesterday Thank you Michael Mattox x
